title: Vibn
blurb: A social app that helps you find your musical match! Users signup through Spotify, and get to interact with other users and see each other's top artists.

title: SafeSrc
blurb: An app that helps users get in contact with emergency services alternative to dialing 9-1-1 in their area.

title: AstroLocus
blurb: A companion app that displayed information on Dark Sky Objects of our solar system, and provided a journal feature that stored logs and uploaded images to a backend.

title: Okane
blurb: A simple budgeting app created with vanilla JS that allows users to keep track of their expenses.
